snippet: Environmental concerns threaten the oil sands industry, which is pumping billions of dollars into the Canadian economy and providing thousands of jobs.
abstract: Leak at oil sands project in Northern Alberta has deepened environmental concerns about entire industry, emboldening critics who say reckless expansion has been particularly harmful; oil sands industry is booming in Canada, pumping billions of dollars into economy and providing thousands of jobs.
lead_paragraph: Environmental concerns threaten the oil sands industry, which is pumping billions of dollars into the Canadian economy and providing thousands of jobs.

headline.main: Leak at Oil Sands Project in Alberta Heightens Conservationists’ Concerns
headline.print_headline: Leak at Oil Sands Project in Alberta Heightens Conservationists’ Concerns
